item.title: About
item.description: Computer Science major at Georgia Tech, graduating in December 2019 A driven, goal oriented computer scientist with a strong interest in data science and product development. I’m particularly intruiged by applications of machine learning in automating driving and optimizing transportation at large. I derive excitement from working on products that have tangible impacts on the quality of people’s lives, enabling them to focus their time on the more important interactions.

item.title: Resume
item.description: Download PDF Education Georgia Institute of Technology Aug 2016 – Dec 2019 | Atlanta, GA B.S. in Computer Science (Intelligence and Information Internetworks), Honors Program GPA: 3.68 Affiliations: Alpha Kappa Psi (Business Fraternity), Ramblin’ Raas (Nationally Competitive Dance Team) Relevant Coursework: Machine Learning, Robotics and Perception, Algorithms, Intro to Artificial Intelligence, Intro to Computer Systems and Networks, Computer Organization and Programming, Probability and Statistics, Discrete Math, Linear Algebra, Multivariable Calculus, Data Structures/Algorithms Experience Software Engineering Intern | Lyft, Core Datastores Jan 2019 - Apr 2019 (CURRENT) | Seattle, WA
